name: RajnishOne
subtitle: A source for qBitConnect, a modern qBittorrent remote client.
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find qBitConnect, a Flutter-based remote client for managing qBittorrent downloads with a modern UI and real-time updates.

apps.name: qBitConnect
apps.subtitle: Modern qBittorrent remote client.
apps.localizedDescription: qBitConnect is a modern, cross-platform remote client for managing your qBittorrent downloads on iOS devices. With qBitConnect, you can effortlessly add torrents via magnet links or files, browse and manage files, monitor your download progress with real-time updates, and control your torrents from anywhere. Features include multiple theme options (Light, Dark, OLED), advanced filtering and sorting, batch operations, detailed statistics, and a beautiful native iOS user interface built with Flutter.

versions.localizedDescription:
Latest improvements:

• Enhanced real-time monitoring and updates
• Improved connection stability and error handling
• Better performance and memory optimization
• UI/UX refinements and bug fixes
• Updated dependencies for better compatibility

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: This app needs access to your local network to connect to qBittorrent servers on your network.
